title: Intensive Short-Term Course for Enhancing Digital Game Design Competencies Based on XR-CoP

context.prior_knowledge: Principles of Game Design, Proficiency in Digital Media Production Tools
context.additional_context: Graduate-level social studies integrated program with experiential learning environments utilizing personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively complete one game prototype in an XR-CoP (Extended Reality Community of Practice) environment.
Learners achieve proficiency of 4.5/5.0 or higher in sound design and interactive design domains.
Over 90% of participating learners engage in weekly community activities at a rate of 90% or higher.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
